nio/MySQLInsert.description: Stores input signals in a MySQL database.

commit_after_query.title: Commit After Query
commit_after_query.description: Whether or not to issue a commit after a query is executed.

credentials.title: Connection Credentials
credentials.description: MySQL user name and password to connect to database.

database.title: Database Name
database.description: Name of MySQL database to connect to.

retry_timeout.title: Retry Timeout
retry_timeout.description: When disconnected, this specifies how long to wait before attempting to connect.

target_table.title: Target table
target_table.description: MySQL table to insert into.  Allows to specify/calculate table name from signal

default.description: A record will be inserted into the database for each input signal.
A signal containing number of successfully added items.
